vibeCoding.title: Beyond "Vibe Coding": Why I Stopped Writing Code and Started Directing Agents
vibeCoding.excerpt: 45% of code is already written by AI. The job is no longer typing, it's orchestrating. This is my philosophy as an "AI Pilot".

tddOwasp.title: AI as a Vulnerable "Intern": My TDD and OWASP Flow in the GenAI Era
tddOwasp.excerpt: AI generates code with vulnerabilities (Vulnerability as a Service). My job is to apply "Security by Design" and TDD to audit it. Zero trust is the new norm.

caseStudy.title: Case Study: How I Orchestrated a Team of Agents to Build This Very Portfolio
caseStudy.excerpt: This site was not written by me, it was directed by me. I break down the "team" of agents (agente_bootstrap, agente_visual...) that I used in Cursor to clone and customize this site in hours, not weeks.
